text: hello how are you?
good evening! How was your day? what did you do to stay busy?
I am feeling ill today so I did not do much.
sorry to hear that! do you have the flu or a cold?
I think it's a cold. No fun at all.
the upside to being sick is that it is a good excuse to be lazy and watch tv. did you watch anything good? my favorite show these days is goliath.
I'm watching ER. Have you heard about the organization Save the Children?
ER is classic. What is Save the Children?
. Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries
I like that it is non-governmental. I think government should stay out of charities. I'm all about minimal government.
I totally agree. It has a very good reputation and has made a great impact in the world.
do you know what they do with their donations? i hear many organizations use donations to pay CEOs instead of going towards the cause.

Our independently audited financial statements consistently show that nearly 9 out of every 10 dollars we spend goes to programs and services for children and families in need. We keep administrative costs low so that more funding goes to children's programs.
that is reassuring. My charitable donations are limited due to budgetary constraints so i am happy to hear this is a worthy charity.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I will donate 10 cents.
Small donations will indeed help a lot of children and their families.
are you going to donate also?
I plan to donate 10 cents as well.
great. Imagine if everyone did the same what a difference it would make.
